# Exclude list for Obsidian vault backup
# Files and folders to skip during backup

# Obsidian system files
.obsidian/
.obsidianignore

# Scripts folder (already backed up separately if needed)
Scripts/

# Temporary and cache files
*.tmp
*.temp
*.cache
*.log

# OS generated files
.DS_Store
Thumbs.db
desktop.ini

# Git files
.git/
.gitignore
.gitattributes

# IDE and editor files
.vscode/
.idea/
*.swp
*.swo
*~

# Node modules and build files
node_modules/
dist/
build/
*.min.js
*.min.css

# Large media files (optional - uncomment if needed)
# *.mp4
# *.avi
# *.mov
# *.wmv
# *.flv
# *.mkv

# Archive files
*.zip
*.rar
*.7z
*.tar
*.gz

# Database files
*.db
*.sqlite
*.sqlite3

# Lock files
*.lock
package-lock.json
yarn.lock
